title: Carlos Cardona Andrade
text:
CV
  

      
Welcome to my website! It is still under construction as you will notice while exploring other sections. Another changeâ€¦
I am economist interested in identity formation and nation building in Africa. I did my PhD at The University of Warwick.


Graduation Cap PhD in Economics, 2024 | University of Warwick
Graduation Cap MRes in Economics, 2019 | University of Warwick
Graduation Cap MA in Economics, 2016 | Universidad del Rosario
Graduation Cap BA in Economics, 2014 | Universidad del Rosario



Development Economics | Political Economy | Economic History

title: Reconciling Weather Datasets in Africa
text:
Introduction




Source: The maps use data from the Climatic Research Unit and the University of Delaware respectively.



This is a project aiming to collect weather datasets for Africa that are most widely used by development economist, to analyze their distinctive predictive power for agricultural output and conflict, and to give a recommendation about when and how to improve their use. I will update the current state of the project soon.
